column4: Does anybody know why the program "DeVeDe" won't convert the entire movie for me so I can burn it?
what do you mean? do you get an error message at some point?
No it just only converts about 2 min. of the movie but also when I watch the movie it says I need to download some other video player to watch it. It doesn't make any sense.
sounds like you didn't install all the extras that sprung just linked to
sprung: thank you hope I can get it figured out. I wish Ubuntu and other Linux op. systems were as easy to figure stuff out as it is for Windows but everything else stayed the same.
I know I feel like I am lost all the time haha
welcome to the club, we all felt that way when we started
everything I go to use something it needs 3 or 4 other programs or something to go with it
if you are installing things with synaptic it should pull all the dependencies with it
is the the Ubuntu software center?
Ubuntu software center is another front end but it should work the same, just not list all the individual packages
not totally sure but under the admin menu I believe
thank you I found it, so should I just start installing my programs/apps with this synaptics?
there or the software center, both are good
oh wow I don't know if I could ever get this synaptic figured out, sometimes I feel like giving up and going back to the crap os windows just because at least I know what I am doing.
I use the search function alot but the software center is just as good
sprung: thank you for your help I am checking out that link now that you sent me sprung.
